issue.title: Arrow build error with clang-10 (Apple Clang / LLVM)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2675](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2675). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As mac os X has been updated to the version 10.13.5 and XCode has been updated to XCode 9.4, the clang (Apple Clang / LLVM) version has also been updated to clang-10 correspondingly. However, Arrow can only be built under clang-9, as shown in the file 

<https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/b1d1633c90d20d3cbcbcee9a29c3f057164bb53c/cpp/cmake_modules/CompilerInfo.cmake#L77>

and now I have solved it, see <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2106>
